(according to the sensors Foxfingers and Razor Claw already had a miserable=
 death, Foxfingers is useing a dampening field to make them invisable to th=
e scanners.)

Lunarpine answered Shivahs comment with "You're partly right,=
 I was at one point a Maximal, now my loyalties are to my friends as an ind=
ependant." he knew he was pushing his luck but he'd always been stubborn en=
ough to push until it pushed back. "As for the anti-virus, it is ours and w=
ill remain with us until we see Silver Scout exit." He knew it was in the P=
redacons best interests to keep Silver Scout alive, especially if any Preds=
 were infected.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Airshadow Nightligh=
t 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, August 13, 2001 12:06 PM
 =
 Subject: Ender/Mutants/Waitting/Blaze/Silverscout


      Shivah said to E=
nder "Over that factions (Alliance and Destrons) who are the best to get an=
 alliance? "after that the male opend his comm link to Blaze and Silverscou=
t "Blaze and Silverscout, go to area 23" and looking to Drillbit "As soon a=
s I end to deal with this pest, we can continue our businness "

      Shiv=
a opened com link with Lunarpine "Why don't you give us the anti-virus and =
later we can chat about Silverscout?  if you don't do it I will kill her to=
gether your two friends that I've have in my hands"

      BlackFortress Ex=
ternal defences turned on and aimed to Lunarpine; the room where Razor Claw=
s and Foxfingers were, the acyd level started to increase.

      "I've tol=
d you Lunarpine of MAximals -Yes I know that you have been in Maximal base =
due that I give you that name" said Shivah "I told you that I haven't humou=
r this day, unless you give me that antivirus to cure Silverscout... You an=
d your friends are going to die with a horrible death!!!!"
